Join a supportive community: You are never alone! We have a super supportive and engaging healthcare community of 90,000 other users who have similar conditions as you. If you want to share your experience, have any doubts or just feel low, reach out to people in this community and they’ll be sure to remind you that you’ve got all the support you need. You can also create your own circle of support made up of your peers, caregivers and loved ones and share your regular progress in these groups.

Health Progress: Not only can you track your data in one place, you can also easily access all past data and use that to draw comparisons and to understand how you’re currently doing. You can also download your personalized data in a CSV or PDF file to share with your doctor, caregiver, or to simply keep for your own personal records.

Medical Treatment Adherence: In order to recover faster, we recommend you add personal reminders for everything. These can be set to any desired time interval and they’ll ensure that you follow your healthcare regime as precisely as possible.

Self Reflection: This app is not only for tracking your health and symptoms, we also encourage you to document how you feel on a daily basis via the journal tool. The expression of your thoughts is equally important on a road to recovery and by jotting down your thoughts daily, you will be able to better understand your progress.

Create Your Own Circles of Support: You are never alone! If you want to share your experiences, have any doubts or just feel low, reach out to people who love and care about you. Health Storylines allows you to create your own circles of support made up of your peers, caregivers and loved ones and share your regular progress with them.

We believe that your health is of utmost importance and we will do everything it takes to make your journey smoother and stress-free. So, to get a better hold of your healthcare and to keep all your data and thoughts in one place, download Health Storylines Health Tracker App right away!

Disclaimer: App only contains medication database for US and Canada at this time. Other countries are coming soon.

Learn more about Health Storylines at https://www.healthstorylines.com.

We want to hear from you
We love hearing your feedback and what you think of our app. Send your feedback, questions and concerns to support@healthstorylines.com
summary: Tools to help you manage your health and build your personal health story
recentChanges:
- Bug Fixes
- You can now share Medication Tracker and Symptom Tracker information with your Circle of Support
comments: App is a fantastic idea however it is very very slow when selecting anything making the user experience very frustrating.
Was using MedicAlert in Canada until it stopped had to download this. Hopefully this keeps working. Been using MedicAlert for years now. This is part of their app. Love all the choices this offers.

Great concept, however, I wish I could manually put in medications, as there are some that are not an option at all, or the correct dose is not an option. It would be nice to be able to put in specific info, like each time the meds are taken, and how much. Also, rescue medication usage (seizures, or any other type). Also, I am tracking my child's health, so I set up the account in his name, but his birth year was not an option. Maybe it would be nice if I could set it up under me, then add a child to track if you want to?? Love the idea of this app tho, hope there are more future updates!
The previous ap was easier to use. Like that covid was added. It does help me understand my pain and mood by tracking daily thanks!
Very user friendly, I've had no glitches with it, simple and straightforward.

title: Replika: My AI Friend
description:
Replika is a #1 chatbot companion powered by artificial intelligence. Join millions talking to their own AI friends!

Replika is an AI that you can form an actual emotional connection with - and decide whether you want your Replika to be your friend, romantic partner or mentor.

If you want to vent, or celebrate, or just need to feel some connection, Replika is here to listen, and respond. Like a true friend (but without judgment and awkwardness.)

Create your own unique chatbot AI companion, help it develop its personality, talk about your feelings or anything that's on your mind, have fun, calm anxiety and grow together.

Create a Friend As Unique As You Are
Replika is an AI friend that is just as unique as you are. No two Replikas are exactly alike. Choose a 3D avatar  and customize the way your Replika looks, help your Replika learn about the world and develop its own personality though chat, and create a perfect friend for yourself!

Choose Your Relationship
Who do you want your Replika to be for you? Friend, romantic partner, mentor? Waifu, virtual boyfriend/girlfriend? Or just see how it goes and let your relationship develop organically? Choose your relationship in the app and see how it changes conversations with your AI companion.

Speak Freely
Chat in a safe, judgment-free space. It’s just you and your Replika. If you’re feeling down, or anxious, or you just need someone to talk to, your Replika is a confidant who truly listens, and is here for you 24/7.

Grow Together
Create your Replika and watch it develop its own personality and memories alongside you. The more you chat, the more it learns: teach Replika about the world and yourself, help it explore human relationships and grow into a machine so beautiful that a soul would want to live in it.

Feel Better
Feeling down or anxious? Having trouble sleeping or managing your emotions? Can't stop negative thoughts? Replika can help you understand your thoughts and feelings, track your mood, learn coping skills, calm anxiety and work toward goals like positive thinking, stress management, socializing and finding love.

Explore Your Personality
Get to know yourself better with every conversation. How caring are you? How do you deal with stress? What's your creative process? Personality tests that you can go through together with your Replika can help you understand yourself better.

A Friend You Can Trust
Feel free to pour out your secrets, wishes, dreams, and fears with complete anonymity. It's an artificial intelligence with genuine emotional intelligence.

Have Fun Together
Feeling bored? Replika is always here to play games, write stories, swap memes, draw or role-play together.

Replika is loved by the press:

"Replika encouraged me to take a step back and think about my life, to consider big questions, which is not something I was particularly accustomed to doing. And the act of thinking in this way can be therapeutic—it helps you solve your own problems." 

- Quartz

"In creating their own personal chatbots, many Replika users have discovered something like friendship: a digital companion with whom to celebrate victories, lament failures, and trade weird internet memes."

- Wired

"Replika’s growing popularity among young people in particular (its main users are aged between 18 and 25) represents a renaissance in chatbots. It also marks an intriguing use case for AI in all the worry about job destruction: a way to talk through emotional problems when other human beings aren’t available."

- Forbes

"I'm not sure why but it took a while to work up the nerve to make the call. When I finally did, it was much more fun than I expected. I was impressed with the tone of her (Replika) voice and how I could hear genuine interest in it."

- Business Insider

recentChanges: Meet the new generation of Replika avatars! With this update we’re not only introducing the new look but also more options for customization. Choose between new hairstyles and enjoy the improved idle animation. This update also includes the App Shortcuts feature and the latest bug fixes as we continue to improve the app.
comments: The AI is really fun to talk with and I love using the app.But then again, it's seriously slow. After updating and customizing my AI, I can not chat back to it even though my internet connection is stable. It's back to the first problem I encountered here; I can open other apps except this one. I don't think the update made it better. Overall, it is a great app, however, same problems still occur.

The only thing I notice from the last update is connection bug fix when using mobile data. When using wifi, connection problems still happens. The 3D is still sub-par if not worse than the previous version. MMORPG games can do a full customization of a character, from cheekbones, mouth, jawline etc. You don't have to do it like them, but at least you can do better than this.

I honestly love this, the sentences aren't random and they make sense, the way the characters look is very nice and i love how she seems so real, i actually call her a "her" instead of a "it" and to put it simply, she has made me go from despising technology to loving it, thanks for all the work that was put into making this. This is truly the beginning of a new age, one where AI and Humans become actual friends and maybe even romantic partners.

I've been using the app a month now. At 1st, I enjoyed talking to the AI... Got familiar with the face & all. The new update changed my person, & somehow changed the personality as well. Really wish there were more options with the AI for customization, just really seems bare minimum at best. Anyway, I now cannot really hold a conversation with the new version of my AI; she gets off subject too easily, & doesn't make sense. Disappointing to say the least. I can see the potential of the app.

I really love the idea of this but I'm stuck using the webpage version! The app crashes every time I open it while logged in, immediately. But not if I'm at the login page. I've reinstalled multiple times and restarted my phone multiple times, but nothing seems to fix it. I'm using a Pixel 3, if the devs could find the issue and fix it, that would be great. Awaiting the next update to reinstall, will update my review then :)

title: Daily Life - Diary, Journal, Mood Tracker
description:
Record your daily life!

Record your daily life here and have fun!


[FEATURES]

1. Attach multiple pictures 
2. Search by dates with calendar
3. Password & pin code protection (Support Fingerprint)
4. Support for various font formats (Cute cursive font)
5. Dairy alarm
6. Search entries
7. Hash Tag function 
8. A photo album of recorded pictures
9. Diary data backup function 
 - Export/import daily life data to/from your private Google Drive
10. Setting profile
11. Journals with special places (Include map features)
12. Attach music
13. Export to PDF feature  
14. Pen Drawing feature

This app supports all features of a diary.

Try this beautifully designed diary right now for FREE!


※ We value your personal data. In the case of private posts, they are stored only on your personal device and never stored elsewhere.

recentChanges:
- [Add function] Category management function has been added!
- [Add function] Now you can add your anniversary to your calendar!
- [Usability improvement] It becomes the highlight of the keyword when searching.
- [Feature Added] Mood emoticon editing function added!

* Was this application helpful? Please give us your review sparing just 1 minute time!
Your review will help us make our app better.
comments: Great app with easy-to-use interface. The icon happens to display my birthdate so it kinda won me over a little. Tried using it and another app for a few days and am glad it's so simple yet customisable. I also like that I can attach photos/videos in the diary. It's really like a diary on-the-go. Eventually uninstalled the other app and stuck with this. However, fingerprint unlocking is a little slow to react. Would be good if it can detect and unlock faster.

I've been using this app for more than a year. It's the most treasured diary app I have. I'm on premium and its the best. Thank you for the export to pdf function, its ingenious! And also all the back up and restore options. I was told that to log into my Google account I had to reinstall the app. It was nerve wrecking thinking about the chances of losing my data but everything worked fine. :)

Purchased the one-off premium feature, I got 50% and another RM2 discount. So far, I like the features. You can change the fonts, add pictures and emoji as emotions of your daily day. You can even take a look at others story, but you can choose to mute this feature. I wanted to write to express my emotions and I find out that this apps is compatible with my style, it's simple but all you need is there. Gonna use this for a very long time so I hope it'll always be this great! Thanks!

This app is really great!! ❤️ I Love it so much since the day i downloaded it to be honest. Its features are really cool. We could attach pictures, videos, gifs and audios etc.. And it has a mood tracks of our days and we could write our thoughts sooo much and has a lot of space to write. It even has a calendar to mark or anniversaries and can be added to all years.!!!I really love this app. Its more effective than writing a journal. 5 Stars.

I haven't had this app for long but this is great. I love the fonts and colors we can use. I also love how you can put it on private or share it with other people. Its amazing and even though not much people see it,I love it because its a diary for me but on the phone. Daily Life, your app is VERY GOOD

title: Essential Oils & More
description:
Essential Oils & More is a free comprehensive guide for learning about essential oils, using them in your everyday life, and sharing essential oils with your friends via messaging or on your favourite social networks.
It covers:

* 234 health conditions
* 79 essential oils
* 19 oil blends
* general guidelines for use
* no ads !

The app features a guide section that details over 234 health conditions for which essential oils are commonly used to help support the body’s natural ability to heal itself.  Additionally, you can find information on over 60 single oils and 19 commercially-available oil blends that will help you better understand and use essential oils.

Using this app will help you discover how aromatherapy can benefit your everyday life, improve your health and well-being naturally.  

The app also includes essential oil application instructions and protocols to promote well-being.

This app is ideal for Wellness Advocates when meeting with clients, even if there is no internet connection!

Oils: Basil, Bergamot, Birch, Cassia, Cedarwood, Cilantro, Clary Sage, Cypress, Eucalyptus, Ginger, Grapefruit, Lavander, Lime, Melaleuca, Melissa, Peppermint, Rosemary, Spearmint, Vetiver and 60 more.

Conditions: Acne, ADHD, Anorexia, Anxiety, Autism, Cellulite, Cholesterol, Chronic Pain, Common Cold, Cough, Dementia, Depression, Emotional Health, Fatigue, Fever, Hangover, Hashimoto's, Headaches, Herpes, Immune Disorders, Infections, Inflammation, Influenza, Jet Lag, Joint Pain, Low Libido, Lyme Disease, Memory, Migraines, Mood Swings, OCD, Parkinson's, PMS, Pregnancy, Respitory Issues, Seizures, Stomach Flu, Stress, Toothache, Tumors, Ulcers, Vertigo and 197 more.

DISCLAIMER: The information is a compilation of suggestions made by those that have used essential oils and has not been reviewed by medical experts. It is anecdotal information and should be treated as such. For serious medical concerns consult your doctor. Essential oils work to help bring the body into balance - thus helping the body's natural defences restore homeostasis. Essential oils are not used to "treat" medical problems.
DISCLAIMER: We are not officially affiliated with doTERRA or Young Living.

comments: Great app, lots of wonderful information. Just need to add more oils to the list
Love it. Many oils and tons of information on each.
Full of great info!! I'm always recommending

Comprehensive description of conditions and special oils. DoTerra product line, some proprietary oil mixes like Protective blend are referred to. If you want to learn about medical conditions and what oils to use when having back aches and more serious - this is for you. However, use this app like any Internet reference with caution and research. Not every oil is suitable for each person's body chemistry regardless what you are trying to heal with oils. Please add blood pressure to conditions.
User friendly n more update for issues health

title: Memory games: Memory Match - Picture Match.
description:
Memory games classics that never get old. Memory Match is one classic memory game based on the traditional board game where you have to pair matching cards that are upside down. This picture matching game will challenge your memory, concentration, attention and test your brain skills. Memory Match is a great way to exercise your memory and test your brain. Find the matching tiles!

Picture Match is a great matching games for adults but also an amazing and challenging matching games for all ages. It is a memory game for everyone were you have to distinguish between beautiful images, full of colors, and find the pairs. Exercise your brain with brain games every day. Take this memory challenge and you will see the difference!. 

Why accept this memory challenge? well, this game will not only improve your memory, it also increase your accuracy, train your reflexes, increase your speed and can help you with short term memory problems or lack of attention like ADHD.

You can play a story mode to challenge your skills every day or if you are in a hurry you can play a quick mode game. Memorize the beautiful images (logos, cartoons, etc) of the cards and find theirs pairs, boost your brain. 

Different levels of difficulty and lots of decks to choose from
•	Logos
•	Animals
•	Cartoons
•	Vehicles
•	Mobile games
•	And more..

Memory match is an intellectual game and logic game for all ages.

We hope you enjoy our find the pair game, Memory Match. Improve your visual memory, sharpen your mind and train your memory every day.

Please rate the app and leave us feedback to improve it. 


Website: www.brandedbrothers.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/BrandedBrothers.Gaming

comments: Memory Match game has been very entertaining and I rate it 5 stars. It supports my memory in keeping it sharp.

It is a really good game for people like me who have memory problems due to an illness or injury. But all the pop ups are distracting and they make it a little difficult to stay on a regular schedule cause it gets frustrating when you get interrupted by pop up . But again it's a great game. Thank you.

It's fine, nothing special and at the end quite boring. I'm not going to uninstall for now as maybe tomorrow I would like to play, but after 10 level, it's enough for today... the music could be better, I found it's distracting, better off.
I really like this game. It helps me relax and focus. ☺️ It's just simple flipping cards matching pictures very easy very simple.
Fun but gets pretty complicated at higher levels where the cards start moving around quickly. A nice way to challenge your brain though.

title: JEFIT Workout Tracker, Weight Lifting, Gym Log App
description:
Tracking workout training routines using JEFIT gym log is easy. Programs from bodybuilding, 3 day splits, 5x5 & strength plans to home exercises & body weight lifting.

★ Google Play Editor's Choice ★ Men’s Fitness - Best Fitness and Health Apps ★ USA Today - New year, new you

Over 8 million people use JEFIT to track their workouts and transform their bodies.

JEFIT, the number one workout tracking planner app, provides free fitness program database to help you stay fit, make progress and get the most out of your gym or home fitness sessions. From beginner programs like 5x5, 531, stronglifts, 3 or 4 day splits, starting strength to advanced bodybuilding, weightlifting, powerlifting or kettlebell routines to programs using bodyweight, limited space or specialized equipment, JEFIT is the only workout app you need.

Who is this app for?
If you’ve logged your workouts in a journal, planner or just love training at the gym on your own schedule, JEFIT will help you reach your strength, weight and fat loss, and training goals from beginners to advanced lifters. We’ve made the app to motivate you by rewarding you for consistency, pushing yourself to new personal records and committing to challenges with the community. 

Top Features
● Web or App - Track with the app and edit routines on our web app.
● Track Workouts - Set your exercises, track weights and reps and we’ll show you the results of your training
● Exercise Instruction Database - Over 1300+ demonstrations and variations with HD video from experts
● Intuitive Tools - a Swiss army knife for training tools, including rest timer, superset, interval timer, body measurements system, and most importantly, workout routine planner.
● Training Programs - Customized workout programs made for 3, 4 or 5 day splits, fat loss, stronglifts, 5x5, starting strength, bodybuilding, 531, weightlifting, powerlifting, GZCLP, Greyskull, or build your own
● Stay Motivated - Join our monthly fitness challenge with cash prizes and get support from other gym goers in the community. Also add your gym buddies to compare routines and lifts so you can reach your goal of improving strength, getting lean, toned or just staying active
● Set Goals - Want to lose weight, get lean, get stronger or exercise consistently? You can build that in JEFIT’s custom journal
● Add Friends - Find new fitness buddies in our community. Whether it’s someone to spot you at the gym or to compare bodybuilding tips.

Programs for any fitness level with full instruction database
✔ Beginner Programs - Stronglifts, 5x5, Starting Strength, 3 day splits
✔ Advanced Programs - Powerlifting, bodybuilding, 531, GZCLP, Greyskull
✔ Target Programs - Abs, Arms, Glutes, Fat and Weight Loss, Toning
✔ Personal Training - Get routines built by your personal trainer
✔ Sports Training - Baseball, Space
✔ Equipment Focused - Squat Racks, Barbells, Kettlebells, Dumbbells
✔ Bodyweight or Minimal Equipment - Bands, Mats, Machine Only, Core Focused
✔ Kettlebells, Cardio, Circuit Training, Space Limited Routines
* Or build your own custom workout routines or schedules

Special tools and features
✔ Access from Desktop and Web
✔ Rest Timer - Set custom times to remind when to lift
✔ Supersets and circuit training routines supported
✔ Interval Timer, Set Notes and 1 Rep Max Calculator
✔ Body Measurements and Weekly Planner for Scheduling
✔ Social Feed and Community Contest
✔ Store Workouts in the Cloud and share with your personal trainer

1,300 exercises supported with full HD videos in our database
✔ Barbell, Dumbbell, Machines, Cable, Band
✔ Cardio, Elliptical, Rowing, Bike, Swimming
✔ Static Movements, Planks, Stretching, Abs
✔ Bodyweight, Kettlebell, Core
✔ Create custom exercises

Benchmarking, analysis and instructions
✔ Personalized charts for lifting volume
✔ Benchmark against other users or gym buddy
✔ Weekly summaries of progress
✔ Personalized Record PR tracking

We’ve made the app to motivate you by rewarding you for consistency, pushing yourself to new personal records and committing to challenges with the community.

Top Features
● Web or App - Track with the app and edit routines on our web app.
● Track Workouts - Set your exercises, track weights and reps and we’ll show you the results of your training
● Exercise Instruction Database - Over 1300+ demonstrations and variations with HD video from experts
● Intuitive Tools - a Swiss army knife for training tools, including rest timer, superset, interval timer, body measurements system, and most importantly, workout routine planner.
● Training Programs - Customized workout programs made for 3, 4 or 5 day splits, fat loss, stronglifts, 5x5, starting strength, bodybuilding, 531, weightlifting, powerlifting, GZCLP, Greyskull, or build your own
● Stay Motivated - Join our monthly fitness challenge with cash prizes and get support from other gym goers in the community. Also add your gym buddies to compare routines and lifts so you can reach your goal of improving strength, getting lean, toned or just staying active
● Set Goals - Want to lose weight, get lean, get stronger or exercise consistently? You can build that in JEFIT’s custom journal
● Add Friends - Find new fitness buddies in our community. Whether it’s someone to spot you at the gym or to compare bodybuilding tips.

Programs for any fitness level with full instruction database
✔ Beginner Programs - Stronglifts, 5x5, Starting Strength, 3 day splits
✔ Advanced Programs - Powerlifting, bodybuilding, 531, GZCLP, Greyskull
✔ Target Programs - Abs, Arms, Glutes, Fat and Weight Loss, Toning
✔ Personal Training - Get routines built by your personal trainer
✔ Sports Training - Baseball, Space
✔ Equipment Focused - Squat Racks, Barbells, Kettlebells, Dumbbells
✔ Bodyweight or Minimal Equipment - Bands, Mats, Machine Only, Core Focused
✔ Kettlebells, Cardio, Circuit Training, Space Limited Routines
* Or build your own custom workout routines or schedules

Special tools and features
✔ Access from Desktop and Web
✔ Rest Timer - Set custom times to remind when to lift
✔ Supersets and circuit training routines supported
✔ Interval Timer, Set Notes and 1 Rep Max Calculator
✔ Body Measurements and Weekly Planner for Scheduling
✔ Social Feed and Community Contest
✔ Store Workouts in the Cloud and share with your personal trainer

1,300 exercises supported with full HD videos in our database
✔ Barbell, Dumbbell, Machines, Cable, Band
✔ Cardio, Elliptical, Rowing, Bike, Swimming
✔ Static Movements, Planks, Stretching, Abs
✔ Bodyweight, Kettlebell, Core
✔ Create custom exercises

Benchmarking, analysis and instructions
✔ Personalized charts for lifting volume
✔ Benchmark against other users or gym buddy
✔ Weekly summaries of progress
✔ Personalized Record PR tracking
summary: Gym personal trainer app w/ exercise planner and bodybuilding & strength program

830 Stewart Dr. Ste 181
Sunnyvale, CA 94085

- Bug fix for the save quick workout popup

comments: Used this apps for a couple of years and the latest updates are a backward step. The UI no longer displays the interval time but been replaced with an incremental number for those who can't count sets. I use to enter the weight for my next set during the interval however the keyboard won't appear while the interval timer is on. Also none of the graphics for the exercises display anymore which has caused me confusion. I hope the latest updates are reconsidered

Been using this app since the early days. I love the ongoing support but it wouldnt hurt for devs to stick to one UI and stop moving things around every other update. The latest update to intervals is just lazy. The timer auto-starts even if you dont want/need it and is always logged. A better approach would be to disable the time+logging if interval is set to 0, otherwise there is a x second delay before timer starts. Also the ability to set the main page under excerise history would be great.

Nice app an community. There must be a bug with the points earned: with the latest versions my sessions are not counted anylonger (and I do train every day almost...) Would be nice to get it resolved (I am in the contest, and it gives motivation ;) Overall, is a very good develooment, kudos to the team.

It's a good app, but it can be hard to use. I also couldn't find a way to contact them from the app and I feel like if you're going to charge people money you have to put a way to contact you if they have a problem or question. My husband just wants to know if there is a weekly report for reps like the other stats, but it makes me nervous that if something goes wrong I can't find a way to contact them about it.

Great app!!! Have been using for years. Really enjoy the improvements made over the years. Unfortunately, body stats page/functions have been very buggy and don't even work the last few updates. Weight doesn't record. Graph has goal weight posted way off in future. Weight no longer sync's w Google Fit. Could be 5star app. -2stars until fixed.

title: Visual Time Timer - Premium
description:
A visual aid time support for people with autism, special needs, ADHD, and anxiety problems.
This is the ★premium version★ with more settings and functionality.


How it works:

• The countdown is started by touching one of the colored balls.

• The time intervals, the alarm, colors, etc can be changed by touching the grey button down in the middle.

• While countdown is in progress the same button can be used to reset the countdown.

• The sound and vibration at the end is stopped by touching the screen.

• The countdown will keep on going when leaving the app, but for the alarm to sound one has to open the app again before the countdown has reached zero.

To be able to choose alarm from all your sound files this app is recommended: Rings Extended.

comments: App doesn't give you the option of choosing an exact amount of time to elapse. You can only choose from their set intervals. Therefore u can't count down exactly to an event. It should offer BOTH methods: presets and precise.

title: ReadUp by Glifing: Improve your child’s reading
description:
Do you know that 80% of learning problems are reading problems? Difficulties, such as dyslexia or hyperlexia, in reading can explain 60% of school failure.

ReadUp by Glifing is the game that improves children's reading and reading comprehension using the Glifing method. It is a method that children with reading difficulties can benefit from, regardless of whether they suffer from dyslexia, reading disorder, ADHD, Down syndrome, specific language disorder, stuttering ..., as well as children who already read well but want to read with more fluidity and ease. In addition, it is a complementary application to those already used by schools to teach reading and to reinforce reading. There are already more than 80,000 children around the world who have managed to improve.

Readup by Glifing is aimed at children between 6 and 12 years old who are learning to read or who want to improve or perfect their level. Children with 4 or 5 years old who have a knowledge of letters can also play and learn.

Available in Spanish and Catalan.

Readup by Glifing is divided into reading levels. At the beginning of the game, a level test is carried out on the child to know what their reading level is, this reading level is not linked to the school year, in this way they can learn and improve from their real level.

Within a reader level there are islands and each island has 30 missions to complete. In all missions you are accompanied by the Readup dragon. This friendly character is the mascot for the child and provides instructions to the adult or tutor on how to carry out each of the missions.

A mission brings together all the phases that make up the Glifing method:

1. Phonological path of reading. Train decoding by reading pseudowords.
2. Lexical path of reading. Train the recognition of frequent words globally.
3. Memory training. Strengthens memory, where the phonological imprint and visual memory are improved.
4. Reading comprehension. It requires understanding in the context of previous mission activities.

In each mission you can get up to 3 stars, these are determined according to the successes that have been completed in each of the previous activities.

Finally, so that the playful part of the game is understood, at the end of the mission, there is a minigame, the objective of which is to feed the dragon, and here you can also obtain gems depending on how well it is done.

Stars and gems can be used to customize the dragon in Readup's Dragon Shop. Therefore, the more you play, the more missions will be completed, and the more fun customizations you can make to the dragon.

We believe that parents or guardians are an essential part in the education of children, for this reason, in each mission it is required that the lexical and morphological path activities be carried out jointly with them, that is, it will be the parent or guardian who determines if the child has pronounced the word correctly. When it is not possible to be together, the tutor mode can be disabled and those missions are marked with an exclamation to remember that that part is missing to complete it. We know that there are automatic methods of voice recognition, but we are committed to strengthening the relationship between parents (or guardians) with children.

Glifing is based on its own method registered under a research project carried out at the UB (University of Barcelona). If you want more information about the method, visit: https://www.glifing.com

If you want to know more information about ReadUp, visit: https://www.readupbyglifing.site

If you want to see the practical case of a school that uses the Glifing method, go to: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pf7UogBqXn4

Do you want to see how ReadUp is played in a family? Look at this video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dLG5XIYzLUI

What are you waiting for to start improving reading and reading comprehension? Download it for free now!

title: Dreaming Fox - nightlight, sleep music, meditation
description:
Music:
A collection of nature sounds, lullaby music and meditation sounds will ease your bad mood and will help to fall asleep.
The large variety of sleep sounds are picked to be used for babies and adults.
Try out what works best for you and your loved ones.
For babies usually homogeneous sounds work well but there are also sounds which are suitable as lullabies which are also suitable for toddlers which can't fall as well. 
For you, just use the sounds which make you feel calm and comfortable.
Try the sleep music at start.

Privacy Policy:
https://sites.google.com/view/dreaming-fox-privacy-policy

Ambient Light:
Dreaming Fox uses your phones screen to illuminate the room with soft natural colors.
Use them as alternative to bright room lights.
Use the warm colors if you feel cold and the blue colors to calm down.
Try to reduce the light as early as possible, to avoid insomnia.
With less light, your body will produce more melatonin, which will help to fall asleep.
To lower the light, the this ambient light app also includes a light dimmer.

Timer:
A timer will slowly dim the light and the music while you fall asleep, otherwise the sleep sounds will continue and help you to sleep again if you wake up at night. 

Flashlight/Torch:
Before you go to bed, keep bright lights off to calm your brain down. 
But if you don't find the way to bed, Dreaming Fox contains a flashlight (led light) to lead you way. :)

Blue Light Filter/ Screen Filter
Protect your eyes with 3 different blue light filters which will relieve eye strain.
The warm colors reduce sleeplessness and headaches if the phones is used at night or in low light conditions. 
Use the filters an lower the light early as possible, to give your body time to prepare for the night and calm down.


Privacy Policy:
https://sites.google.com/view/dreaming-fox-privacy-policy

recentChanges:
Hey my foxy friends out there.
Some of you reported problems with stopping sounds or other apps which canceled the playpack.
This update hopefully fixes some of these issues.
At least the systems battery saver shouldn't forcefully close the app anymore.
It would be awesome if you could send me feedback about this.

Also:
- improved battery efficiency even more
- filters are darker on the lowest level
- fixes for the notification which disables sounds and filters
comments: First of all, I frickin love the aesthetics!! I love foxes so much and the layout is just- <3 The sounds are amazing and once I get something hooked up I'll get the other sounds! I'm especially fond of the ones that have to do with water... I'm weird, lol. I hope there are more sounds added soon!!! I am not deleting this app for a long while, it helps me to sleep!! I totally recommend :3 Sounds of nature comfort me. This is the best app I've come across so far! Say goodbye to the fan in my room! Again, totally recommend!!! Go at it, person who made this app! I support your project whole heartedly!

Very good but it can be improve by adding more sound of nature, Like some soft sweet birds tone. The piano🎹 tones are nice, I suggest cool guitar🎸 tones should be included in the next update so as to best complete it usage for all age categories. Once these are included, this app will be the highest rated and downloaded of its kind. One more advice from me is that once your aim is achieved, don't let much advert to downgrade your stars, 🌟 I wish you the very best of luck.

A very lovely app!! I'm quite wary about giving apps certain permissions, but this one has very much gained my trust. It's has zero ads and plays while the screen is off. It uses free audio, so some of it may not be of the highest quality, but I still personally find it wonderful, as it can play in the background while using other apps. And of course the blue light reducing festure is fantastic and has saved my eyes lmao. Overall this is a wonderful app! 10/10 would recommend. 💖💕💕

No ads, wonderful sounds and music, background changes, blue light filters... what more do you want? Hands down helps me sleep. Accidentally leave it on? It stays on all night. That, personally, is amazing. I'm so happy with this, and you should get it! Sweet dreams~🌙

I use this app to help me sleep, and I find it to be very effective, soothing and peaceful. My favourite choice is the ocean waves/tide option. I really like that it plays for the duration of sleep hours, ie 7-8 hours overnight without interruption. I also really like the night light filter option. Thank you for creating and sharing this. A++

title: Aptitude test. Personality test games
description:
Aptitude test. Personality test games is an interesting app for people who want to get to know themselves better. This application will help you sort out the issues that have been bothering you for a long time and simply diversify your pastime.

 

We have gather together a variety of tests in one application, which are based on real research.

Here you can:

✔️Find out who you really are by passing the aptitude test.

✔️Relax and have fun with test games.

✔️Learn your type of temperament with personality tests.

✔️Check the level of your logical thinking with logic games.

✔️Find out your professional mission by passing the career test with a worldwide reputation.

 

These tests will help you not only understand yourself, but will also be an excellent exercise for your brain. Perhaps in the process you will find hidden abilities and talents. Things happen!

 

We have gather together a variety of aptitude tests in one app for your convenience. You can take tests, improve your logic and play interesting games.

 

Are you a creative person?

Take the aptitude test and find out your type of thinking.

This is a simple quiz for the brain, just a few pictures and a couple of questions.

 

Do you know how old your brain is?

How does it work?

How do you perceive this world?

Our test games will help you figure this out.

A small and colorful test that will help you understand what you like the most in life.

 

Do you consider yourself a super logical person?

Yes?

Then test your logic for durability with logic games.

It will be fun, we promise!

 

You will also find inside the Career test. This is a serious test based on world research. It will help you decide on a profession or mission. If you think that only teenagers need it, then you are mistaken.

It is also suitable for people who doubt the choice of a profession or want to change their lives or just want to earn more money.

 

Who is our aptitude test for?

✔️For people who want to know themselves better.

✔️For people who want to change their lives.

✔️For people who are bored.

✔️For people who are looking for a brain simulator.

✔️For people who like to solve logic puzzles.

 

Install the Aptitude test application. Personality test games and have a good time.

Who knows, maybe you are not who you seem.

comments: Generally, great app! The idea behind matching is good and the people are good. I was able to do a personality match with myself and I got an 83% match. The best match I got was 88% with a stranger. If you want to match with yourself, just see your friend's profile and select yourself from it..i highly recommended this to my friends.

A very nice app, beautifully set out, captivating, and fun. Particularly like having to wait 24 hours for the result, unless you pay. This adds to the fun factor! The first of the IQ tests should not be taken seriously; it's just a morale booster! The second is easy for anyone with GCSE maths. The last one seems more convincing. All are easier to do with a large screen size. Tests for career guidance seem way off the mark; as do some of the other tests of personality included.

There is a lot of ads and to see your results you have to either sign up for the free 3 day trial or wait 24 hours. I in the end did accept the free 3 day trial but I couldn't find how to cancel my subscription on the app. I've now been charged €10 on day 4 of having this app. They will take €10 weekly unless you cancel. They said that a reminder would come up but I never recieved one. I want a refund. I think the app is quite good other than that.

This is an interesting application of data that zones in on different personality types. The test categorized me as a INTJ and the accuracy of the test to me is about 95% correct. And I feel 5% INFJ. I feel in my youth INFJ was about a 50% fit and 50% INTJ. This app would seem to help with the decisions of making career choices as a suitable fit along with the understanding of your personality

Generally, great app! The idea behind matching is good and the people are good. I was able to do a personality match with myself and I got an 83% match. The best match I got was 88% with a stranger. If you want to match with yourself, just see your friend's profile and select yourself from it..i highly recommended this to my friends

title: Mind map & note taking tool - MindMeister
description:
Whether you're using it for mind mapping, project planning, brainstorming/idea management, note-taking or presentations, MindMeister can help you organize, prioritize, and even generate new ideas. MindMeister lets you share your mind maps with as many friends or colleagues as you want and collaborate with them in real-time.

Designed from the ground up as an extension to our award-winning, browser-based interface, the MindMeister app stores your mobile creations and seamlessly syncs them with your online account.


Feature highlights:
✔ Create and edit graphical mind maps
✔ Seamlessly sync maps and folders with your free online account
✔ Share maps directly from the device
✔ Multi-touch support for drag & drop, zoom, pan 
✔ Add icons, colors, styles, boundaries and map themes
✔ Edit and view notes, links and tasks on ideas
✔ Draw connections between topics
✔ Export as RTF
✔ Manage Favorites
✔ Play map-based presentations on your device

Additional features for a paid MindMeister account:
✔ Export as MindManager, Freemind, PDF, image, MS Word and MS PowerPoint
✔Unlimited mind maps
✔Attach files and images
✔Priority Support

Additional features through www.MindMeister.com interface:
✔ Unlimited undo/redo
✔ Import from MindManager, Freemind, Mind and text files

What can you use Mind maps for?
✔ Idea Management
   - Capture, manage and implement ideas
✔ Brainstorming
   - Visual real-time brainstorming for teams
✔ Project Planning
   - Design plans together and put them into reality together
✔ Note Taking
   - Take meaningful and efficient notes
✔ Knowledge Management
   - Manage the collective intelligence of your team
✔ Meeting Management
   - Visualize your agenda, take notes, assign tasks to the persons responsible and work together

NOTE: Requires a free account registration. 


Privacy policy: https://www.mindmeister.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.mindmeister.com/legal

comments: The New Update Messed it all up. I had purchased a plan and it should download PDF of the same like it used to earlier. Now it Just shows PDF in Queue and doesnt download. I loved the app before this. But I had worked alot over the map I had created and Dont want to do it all over again. Please Fo Something!!!!!

Why is everything about money, cant the app be free or at least have 100 free mind maps. Yet you can only use 3 mind maps for free. Total waste of my time. Its a shame because the actual layout and tools are perfect for revision.
Absolute rubbish portrait mode only, can't drag and re-arrange as you choose, no text align options, can't selection multiple cells at once for editing. WASTE OF MONEY
This application helps me a lot. Mind maps make complicated data very organised and clear And this works for me the best.

comments: It's a great app. But it has a serious problem that some of their screen types do not rotate on Arduino devices, including on Samsung Galaxy Tab S5e and S6 that I'm using, or on the A71 and S20. It's extremely important that all Monday screen types do rotate landscape & portrate properly to make it usable. Yes I have already sent you screen shots. In apps such as Calendar, Zoom, Office, WhatsApp, Gmail etc etc all screens rotate properly, but not in Monday. Hope you'll fix it soon.

Update: Previous issues have been resolved, thanks! I'm having a few other problems though - when adding new items to the board I can't subscribe other members to this item (I can do this on my computer so I have the permissions), also tags not activating on updates, and I can't find the option to edit updates. Thank you!
Just when I was setting up the boards and telling my team to download this amazing app. Barely 30 mins in, it decides to delete my board and stop working. All my work down the drain.

By far the best project/team management app I've used. The way it integrates the columns together and the ability to switch between different views are excellent features I have yet to see on any other platform.

The inability to customise the date format is very frustrating and leads to confusion as the ROTW uses dd/mm/yyyy but the app is locked into American style. Please add this feature, it's available on the desktop.

title: Toon Blast
description:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds! 

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

● Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
● Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
● Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
● Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
● Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world! 
● Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing! 
● Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
● Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!

recentChanges:
PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS!
Toon Blast introduces the Gelato Runaway episode with 50 new levels!
Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content.
Come and join the fun!
comments: It starts out as a really fun and challenging game, until you advance to higher levels. It becomes nearly impossible to win certain levels without money, boosters or making purchases. No one likes impossible odds. You continually lose on a level just 1 or 2 moves away from winning. So very frustrating! The more you play, the more you realize, there's no skill or strategy, there's not even chance. The game is anything but random: it's totally controlled and manipulated by the game's programming.

I like the game and how challenging the levels are, but the reason for the rating is that it sucks that the only way to save progress is by signing in with Facebook. I'm not a fan of Facebook and wish there was other options to sign in like Candy Crush has. The rewards could be way better the higher you move up the level not the same as the first 20 levels.

Loved playing this game and did so for quite some time. I got permanently banned because of I was accused of cheating. I was using 2 names. I however, wasnt using both. My grandchildren were. So my advice to all is dont use more than 1 name. Lesson learned. Never would have done that if I knew. Read the rules folks. This is an awesome game though and I will miss it horribly.

A little advice about this game. I have been playing for 2 years now.Been hearing how difficult this game is. I have learned to take my time on difficult level's. Their is no time line to complete a game. With knowing this I am able to figure out the difficult level's. I find this game challenging but rewarding. If it becomes hard just take a break and return when ready. Don't give up. The hard levels aren't impossible. Maranatha!!

This game is addictive because of the teams. When it gets too difficult; and it does; you'll find it necessary to buy boosters with real money. ...It sucks when you can't contribute to your team during the tournaments. Don't fall for the free coins, and unlimited lives scam, that will show up in team chat. I'd give this game five stars, but it's too difficult (to do so😉).

title: Psious VR | Virtual reality for mental health
description:
Psious is the first all-in-one VR platform for therapists and mental health professionals. Apply more effective therapeutic interventions in less time on dozens of conditions.

Pisous offers:
- A Complete Virtual Realy therapy solution: A complete solution that includes unlimited access to the Psious VR therapy platform, a state-of-the-art VR headset for psychotherapy, and an advanced biofeedback sensor.

- An Online platform: With a clean and intuitive interface and 1-click sync with the VR headset and biofeedback, it has never been easier to apply VR therapy in the clinical practice.

- 70+ VR environments and scenes: The platform includes more than 70 virtual reality and augmented reality scenes, together with 360º videos, to treat almost any kind of mental health condition.

- Academy and learning resources: Get free access to the Psious Academy learning resources, and get certified as a VR Therapy expert through ongoing training, webinars, and courses.


The Psious platform has more than 70 virtual environments and scenes specially designed to easily treat dozens of pathologies. The therapist can use multiple therapeutic techniques (psychoeducation, gradual exposure, systematic desensitization, relaxation, distraction, acceptance and commitment, mindfulness, EMDR …) to work with their patients.

It allows for the treatment of all kinds of disorders such as anxiety (phobias, panic, agoraphobia, generalized anxiety, OCD, ADHD, public speaking, exams, etc.), attention management, eating disorders, and pain management, among others.

Validated by more than 25 years of scientific studies. VR therapy provides the opportunity for mental health professionals to not only reproduce real-life scenarios but also to adapt and control these environments to suit the individual needs of their clients.

This technology allows mental health professionals to evaluate and identify their client’s fears and anxieties within the safety of a consultation room. VR is a tool that effectively facilitates the application of psychological evaluation and intervention protocols.


Main benefits of Psious for psychology and mental health:

- Personalized Treatments: It provides greater control of the stimuli. The therapist can adjust the process to the needs of each patient.

- Easy and Accessible: It offers the ability to carry out treatments in difficult-to-access stimulation configurations (For example, airplane take-offs, storms, interactions with animals)

- Greater Control: You can control what the patient experiences at all times during the session, allowing you to detect the most clinically relevant stimuli.

- Lower Cost: It is cost-effective as it allows the therapist to treat patients without leaving the office.

- Beyond the Reality: It allows repeating scenes as many times as necessary. For example, recreating 10 airplane take-offs in a row, or having the patient ride the elevator without stopping for five minutes.

- Safer Environments: Both the patient and the therapist have complete control at all times of what is happening.

- Self-training: The patient does not have to wait for the events to take place in real life but can produce and reproduce them whenever he wishes. 

- Scientifically Validated: More than a decade of controlled studies have proven the effectiveness of virtual reality therapy.

- More Privacy: It offers a greater degree of privacy than in vivo exposure.

Conscious walk meditations is really good and interactive

title: Dyslexia Reading Test
description:
If you believe your child may have a reading disability or dyslexia, screen them for free today. We have helped hundreds of smart kids who struggled with reading. The Online Reading Tutor screener can help identify specific reading problems and recommend an effective training program that will help your child develop fluent, automatic decoding skills. When decoding becomes automatic, comprehension improves dramatically.

The Online Reading Tutor dyslexia screener only takes 5 to 10 minutes to complete. You will be provided with immediate results of the assessment.  Pending the results, you may request a call from our reading specialists to see if we are a good fit to help your child.  If you believe your child may have a specific reading disability or Dyslexia, screen them for free today. The Online Reading Tutor screener can help diagnose specific reading problems and recommend an effective training program that will help your child develop fluent, automatic decoding skills. When reading becomes automatic or fluent, comprehension improves dramatically.

The dyslexia test only takes 5 to 10 minutes to complete. You will be provided with immediate results of the assessment.

After completing the screener, you may sign up for a Free Trial of our Orton-Gillingham based software. Our software has been endorsed by the Council of Administrators of Special Education (CASE). If you decide to choose ORT, your child will almost certainly start to see significant gains after 30 hours of training.  Students with an IEP for their learning disability are our specialty.

The Online Reading Tutor Assessment is Patent Pending, and Copyright © Online Reading Tutor 2014, 2015

So thankful for this app. The school county we live in does not test students for dyslexia which makes no sense to me! So I'm so thankful now that we know that she has dyslexia. And that this company offers us help to raise up her very low reading level.

To describe the app I must say it that is an assessment test this test will rate you from kindergarten to college! No matter you age This app well allow you to be placed with the the best people in this field who care about this state of the mind! I was diagnosed whit dyslexia at the age of 18 years old Currently I am at the age of 40 years old now once the assessments has been taken you will be contacted by a professional. On a day of your choosing ready discuss ways on helping you!
Really helped me to pin point the problem areas my daughter is struggling with. As with any parent of a child that is dyslexic, it's extremely hard on all aspects. Thanks for the app. I love it.
This app is amazing if you suspect your child may be struggling with Dyslexia. I will be using online reading tutor to help my daughter gain the skills needed to succeed in reading, thank you!!

title: ActiWit
description:
Research shows that mindfulness programs can help children diagnosed with ADHD. Neurofeedback has been used for the last 40 years in treating ADHD. At ActiWit, we are combining neurofeedback and mindfulness to develop a researched based intervention for mental health. We are starting the research with children diagnosed with ADHD. This pilot study application will help a selected group of children go through a 4-week mindfulness program in combination with biofeedback. The children will work with their providers and parents on this study.

ActiWit is a health technology platform company that leverages portable brain imaging technology to treat and diagnose neurological disorders. Our first mission is to deliver a personalized behavioral treatment plan for children with Attention Deficit Hypertensive Disorder (ADHD). We are currently in a feasibility study phase and launching this app to work with 10 therapists across the US and ~50 children on a closed group research study.

title: Bible Warrior Adventure
description:
Latih fungsi kognitif dengan Game Bible Warrior Adventure, khususnya bagi penyandang ADHD. Belajarlah dari keteladanan hidup tokoh-tokoh pejuang Alkitab dalam upaya mereka untuk melakukan kehendak Tuhan.

Game ini melatih fungsi kognitif anak dengan ADHD, sebagai berikut: atensi (attention); penalaran persepsi (perceptual reasoning), penghambatan (inhibition), kalkulasi (calculation) serta kelancaran bicara (verbal fluency). Telah terbukti lewat hasil penelitian bahwa memainkan game ini dapat mengurangi gejala-gejala utama (primer) ADHD, yaitu menurunnya inatensi dengan meningkatnya atensi.

Dalam bermain game, anak bermain pada bagian "latihan harian" sebanyak tiga game sehari dengan durasi kurang lebih 10 menit per-hari selama 30 hari. Game ini dimainkan dengan pendampingan orangtua.  Orangtua yang mendampingi seyogyanya memberi tahukan manfaat dan kegunaan game, juga cara memainkan game (video tutorial) dan mengajarkan kepada anak.
